article_title: Consolidation Seen Coming to Oil-Field Services Sector
article_text:
The universe of oil-field services companies—the drillers and technicians that help get oil and natural gas out of the ground—will soon get smaller, Halliburton Co.'s chief financial officer said Tuesday.

"You have too many services companies in the North American market," CFO Mark McCollum told an energy conference in Houston.

Oil-field services companies have helped their energy-company customers release vast...
